boardgame.name: Risk: Le seigneur des anneaux (La trilogie)
Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition
boardgame.description: From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this expanded edition of RISK The Lord of the Rings Trilogy edition you will find: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The detailed gameboard reflects a complete map of Middle-Earth including the Gondor, Mordor, and Haradwaith territories._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes materials from the entire Lord of the Rings film trilogy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Additional Territory cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Additional Battalions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Additional Adventure Cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Alternate ways to play including special rules for alliance team play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From BGG:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This game is essentially the regular Risk: LotR Edition with an additional board on the bottom and some new cards and revised rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Risk: The Lord of the Rings

This is the Lord of the Rings Risk Trilogy Edition game from 2003. The game is in very good condition (very close to new). I opened the game, punched out the cards etc, and played the game only one time. It has sat in my closet ever since playing it that one time. It has no damage at all (has been stored in a dry and safe environment) and is 100% complete (has all the pieces including the little pewter ring that comes with it).

Up for your review is a board game by Parker Brothers, 2003 - Risk: Lord of the Rings (Trilogy Edition) - COMPLETE/UNPLAYED, yes the (1) ring is included. Outer Box is in good condition with (1) taped corner and a compression crease running along (1) side (about 4.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in length) there are also a couple of small _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;dings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; on that same side (not bad but needs mentioned). Interior contents are in unplayed/unpunched condition. Board is very clean and crips. Almost everything is still sealed. NOTE: (2) of the army colors have been opened along with the ring but, everything else is still sealed; other (2) armies, cards and dice. Bottom box has only minimal shelfwear and a very light crease near one of the sides (about 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in length). See actual item photos below for further detail. This game will weigh around 4.5 pounds once it has been packaged for shipping. I will combine multiple purchases being shipped to the same address. Feel free to pm me with any questions you may have in regard to the game listed above. Errors: I try to be as accurate in item description as possible however, I may miss or overlook something with the game listed above. Any oversight is purely accidental and not meant to defraud the buyer in anyway. I will try to work out those errors when possible and I do accept returned items as a last resort (with full payment refunded, minus BGG fees), however postage for the returned item is the buyers responsibility. All items are sold _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;as-is_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Payment: For domestic orders (US) I prefer payment through money order or check but will also accept paypal if need be. For international orders I prefer payment to be made through paypal. I will email you once payment has been received and again once your item has shipped (with delivery confirmation). Shipping: Shipping will be actual charges plus $1.85 (for packing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; delivery conformation). Insurance is optional but recommended. If I do end up overcharging I will simply upgrade to the next shipping rate (i.e. parcel post _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; priority). I always ship items with delivery confirmation. About Me: I have been a member of BGG for several years but have done all my selling of vintage and OOP board games on Ebay. Since last year (march ‘08) when their site went through radical modifications it became too expensive and risky in my estimation to continue business through their site. You can look up my user id: junkfield - by going to the community page on their website and read over my 100% positive feedbacks. I appreciate your interest in this game and look forward to selling through BGG. Thanks, Jon
